text.autoconfig.dragonhelper.title: DragonHelper Config
text.autoconfig.dragonhelper.option.mess: Hides the dragon item drop messages for other players
Hides the summoning eye placement messages
Hides the loot number and magic find text
text.autoconfig.dragonhelper.option.auto: Automatically runs the /sell command during the auto-sell
Automatically runs the /specialsell command during the auto-sell
Automatically sells summoning eyes during the auto-sell
Frequency, in seconds, to run the auto-sell commands
text.autoconfig.dragonhelper.option.noti: Notifies you with a large title text when a superior dragon spawns
Notifies you with a large title text when an infernal dragon spawns
Notifies you with a large title text when the endstone protector spawns
text.autoconfig.dragonhelper.option.ui.z: Shows a Zealot kill counter on your screen
text.autoconfig.dragonhelper.option.ui.d: Shows a dragon kill counter on your screen
text.autoconfig.dragonhelper.option.ui.e: Shows an endstone protector kill counter on your screen
Shows the time (in seconds) until the next endstone protector spawn
text.autoconfig.dragonhelper.option.ui.r: Shows your current RNG meter experience
text.autoconfig.dragonhelper.option.ui.z: Shows your current zombie slayer level progress
key.dragonhelper.configScreen: Edit the UI layout for DragonHelper!
